_meanings:
{@--3@} To
look upon, consider or regard as,
know to be.

{@--5@} To remember, recollect;
used with the Future instead of the
Imperfect, Imperfect with {#yat#}, or both
when interdependence of two actions
is denoted, <ls>P. III. 2. 112</ls>, <ls n="P. III. 2.">114</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab>
<ls>Bk. 6. 138</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 6.">139.</ls>
